name: Jack's Star Destroyer
description:
Survive against quasi-endless waves of alien invaders! Your one mission: protect planet Earth. Keep it alive, if you will.

Controls: WASD to move, Space to shoot

Pick up the upgrades below Earth after each wave to progress.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46! Any feedback is appreciated!

Tools used: Unity 2019.3, Asesprite, bfxr
